an3.112:1.3: Atīte, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando jāyati;
an3.112:1.4: anāgate, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando jāyati;
an3.112:1.5: paccuppanne, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando jāyati.
an3.112:1.6: Kathañca, bhikkhave, atīte chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando jāyati?
an3.112:1.7: Atīte, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha cetasā anuvitakketi anuvicāreti.
an3.112:1.8: Tassa atīte chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha cetasā anuvitakkayato anuvicārayato chando jāyati.
an3.112:1.10: Etamahaṃ, bhikkhave, saṃyojanaṃ vadāmi yo cetaso sārāgo.
an3.112:1.11: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, atīte chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando jāyati.
an3.112:2.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, anāgate chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando jāyati?
an3.112:2.2: Anāgate, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha cetasā anuvitakketi anuvicāreti.
an3.112:2.3: Tassa anāgate chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha cetasā anuvitakkayato anuvicārayato chando jāyati.
an3.112:2.5: Etamahaṃ, bhikkhave, saṃyojanaṃ vadāmi yo cetaso sārāgo.
an3.112:2.6: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, anāgate chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando jāyati.
an3.112:3.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, paccuppanne chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando jāyati?
an3.112:3.2: Paccuppanne, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha cetasā anuvitakketi anuvicāreti.
an3.112:3.3: Tassa paccuppanne chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha cetasā anuvitakkayato anuvicārayato chando jāyati.
an3.112:3.5: Etamahaṃ, bhikkhave, saṃyojanaṃ vadāmi yo cetaso sārāgo.
an3.112:3.6: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, paccuppanne chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando jāyati.
an3.112:3.7: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi nidānāni kammānaṃ samudayāya.
an3.112:4.3: Atīte, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando na jāyati;
an3.112:4.4: anāgate, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando na jāyati;
an3.112:4.5: paccuppanne, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando na jāyati.
an3.112:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, atīte chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando na jāyati?
an3.112:5.2: Atītānaṃ, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniyānaṃ dhammānaṃ āyatiṃ vipākaṃ pajānāti.
an3.112:5.4: Tadabhinivattetvā cetasā abhinivijjhitvā paññāya ativijjha passati.
an3.112:5.5: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, atīte chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando na jāyati.
an3.112:6.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, anāgate chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando na jāyati?
an3.112:6.2: Anāgatānaṃ, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniyānaṃ dhammānaṃ āyatiṃ vipākaṃ pajānāti.
an3.112:6.4: Tadabhinivattetvā cetasā abhinivijjhitvā paññāya ativijjha passati.
an3.112:6.5: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, anāgate chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando na jāyati.
an3.112:7.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, paccuppanne chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando na jāyati?
an3.112:7.2: Paccuppannānaṃ, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniyānaṃ dhammānaṃ āyatiṃ vipākaṃ pajānāti, āyatiṃ vipākaṃ viditvā tadabhinivatteti, tadabhinivattetvā cetasā abhinivijjhitvā paññāya ativijjha passati.
an3.112:7.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, paccuppanne chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando na jāyati.
an3.112:7.4: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi nidānāni kammānaṃ samudayāyā”ti.
